name: Cryo Elemental Infusion
description:
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG dealt converted to Cryo DMG.
(Lasts until the Round ends)
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached has their $[K100] dealt converted to $[K101].\n(Lasts until the Round ends)
descriptionreplaced: The character to which this is attached has their {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.\n(Lasts until the Round ends)
